Our story

Willis Protocol and Concierge Service Ltd, is a professional Meet and Assist service provider offering services to departing,arriving and transiting passengers. Willis Protocol and Concierge Service Ltd is based at JKIA-Nairobi,the regional airline hub with presence at both Jomo Kenyatta International Airport and Wilson Airport.
